r.d: Web Interface to the PEAR Installer
r.n: * Fix Bug #10427: wrong dependencies [tias] * Fix Bug #10428: install dependencies of package [tias] * Fix Bug #10429: some small bugfixes [tias] * Fix Bug #10430: remote-info broken for installed packages [tias] * Small changes in the templates files, that makes stuff much nicer * config-show submit: only config-set what has changed (and never the buggy Filename that can not be changed this way), and output it nicely.
